body: @BD103 this seems like a great lint candidate!

issue.title: TextInput can't be used with the "require" system

repository.name: bevy_simple_text_input
repository.description: Bevy plugin for a simple single-line text input widget.

issue.body:
As the title states, TextInput can't be used with the new "require" system. 
I'm attempting to do the following for cleanliness:
```rust
#[derive(Component)]
#[require(TextInput)] // <- Missing Default impl here
struct NameInput;     // <- custom struct used for filtering query
```

I'm using bevy 0.15 for reference.
I'd happily patch this but I'm currently busy with making a game, so just leaving this here as its probably a simple oversight.

If anyone happens to patch this, thanks in advance!

(I also posted a [similar issue](https://github.com/bevyengine/bevy/issues/17052) in the main bevy repository and they may be adding a lint for it in the future, could be neat to keep eyes on for other projects)

body:
> @BD103 this seems like a great lint candidate!

Interesting! Is the idea to recommend all `Component`s implement `Default`, or is there some more specific criteria for the lint?
All unit structs that impl Component should impl Default :)

issue.title: Derived `Default` for all public unit components.

labels.name: C-Feature
labels.description: A new feature, making something new possible

labels.name: D-Trivial
labels.description: Nice and easy! A great choice to get started with Bevy

labels.name: S-Ready-For-Final-Review
labels.description: This PR has been approved by the community. It's ready for a maintainer to consider merging it

repository.name: bevy
repository.description: A refreshingly simple data-driven game engine built in Rust

issue.body:
Derived `Default` for all public unit structs that already derive from `Component`. This allows them to be used more easily as required components.
To avoid clutter in tests/examples, only public components were affected, but this could easily be expanded to affect all unit components.

Fixes #17052.

issue.title: Lint: Unit components should implement `Default`

labels.name: A-Linter
labels.description: Related to the linter and custom lints

labels.name: D-Straightforward
labels.description: Simple bug fixes and API improvements, docs, test and examples

repository.name: bevy_cli
repository.description: A Bevy CLI tool and linter.

issue.body:
See https://github.com/bevyengine/bevy/issues/17052 for context.

Unit structs that implement `Component` should also implement `Default`, so they can be used with required components.

```diff,rust
- #[derive(Component)]
+ #[derive(Component, Default)]
pub struct IsDefaultUiCamera;
```
